subject: Concussions
Football
lead_paragraph: The chairmen of the N.F.L.’s revamped head, neck and spine medical committee said their goal is to change the culture among players, who have a tendency to play down head injuries.
snippet: The chairmen of the N.F.L.’s revamped head, neck and spine medical committee said their goal is to change the culture among players, who have a tendency to play down head injuries.
